basic.blooming: Foliage plants, rarely blooming, flower is light yellow

maintenance.soil: Peat or soil with specific nutrients
maintenance.sunlight: Like sufficient light, avoid strong light in summer
maintenance.watering: Like wet, water thoroughly when soil surface is dry
maintenance.fertilization: Dilute fertilizers following instructions, apply once monthly in spring and autumn
maintenance.pruning: Remove old, diseased and dead leaves timely
